StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc20
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @intUserID int, @intRoleID int, @intOrgUnitID int, @IsPSROrgUnit bit = 0 ) AS
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [Post] WHERE [RoleID] = @intRoleID AND [OrgUnitID] = @intOrgUnitID AND [IsPSROrgUnit] = @IsPSROrgUnit) BEGIN INSERT INTO [Post] ([RoleID], [OrgUnitID], [IsPSROrgUnit]) VALUES (@intRoleID, @intOrgUnitID, @IsPSROrgUnit) END
DECLARE @intPostID int SET @intPostID = (SELECT TOP 1 [ID] FROM [Post] WHERE [RoleID] = @intRoleID AND [OrgUnitID] = @intOrgUnitID AND [IsPSROrgUnit] = @IsPSROrgUnit)
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [UserPost] WHERE [UserID] = @intUserID AND [PostID] = @intPostID) BEGIN INSERT INTO [UserPost] ([UserID], [PostID]) VALUES (@intUserID, @intPostID) END
